opinion.posture: Indictment charging defendant with violation of The Vehicle Code. Before HEIMBACH, P.J. Finding of guilty and judgment of sentence entered. Defendant appealed. Appeal, No. 1317, Oct. T., 1975, from Court of Common Pleas of Carbon County, April T., 1975, No. 17. Submitted December 16, 1975.
opinion.attorneys: Sol Lubin, for appellant; John Deutsch, for Commonwealth, appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
WATKINS, former P.J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.Page 616
